abstract: Updated: 5:29 p.m.: With new ratings data throughout:Fox dominated Wednesday’s ratings with the highest rated Game 1 of the World Series since the last time the Red Sox appeared, three years ago. From 8:30 to just after midnight, the game delivered an average of 16.9 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s final ratings, putting Fox in the lead during every time slot of the night.
lead_paragraph: Updated: 5:29 p.m.: With new ratings data throughout:Fox dominated Wednesday’s ratings with the highest rated Game 1 of the World Series since the last time the Red Sox appeared, three years ago. From 8:30 to just after midnight, the game delivered an average of 16.9 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s final ratings, putting Fox in the lead during every time slot of the night.

headline.main: Red Sox Rule! (In the Ratings, At Least)
